name: Morta Technology
description:
The Construction industry is US$11trn globally and is one of the most inefficient. Most construction startups concentrate on Augmented Reality, Artificial Intelligence and other promising technologies. However, the fundamental way information is shared, consumed and administered is fundamentally no different than the way it was in the age of paper.

Morta is an award-winning,  VC-funded, government-grant backed startup focusing on the way information is created, shared, managed and consumed  in construction.

team.title: CTO
team.name: Matthew Morrison
team.bioHtml: Founder and CTO @Morta Technology MSc Computer Science from Imperial College London

team.title: CEO
team.name: Mohammad Shana'a
team.bioHtml: Founder @Morta Technology • Worked as Associate to Chief Information Officer of a top 20 International Contractor • MPhil in Engineering from Cambridge
